00028 template <typename Iter1, typename Iter2>
00029 class Mypair
00030 {
00031   typedef typename std::iterator_traits<Iter1>::value_type value_type1;
00032   typedef typename std::iterator_traits<Iter2>::value_type value_type2;
00033 public:
00034   Mypair(const Iter1 a, const Iter2 b)
00035   {
00036     iter1=a;
00037     iter2=b;
00038     val1 = *a;
00039     val2 = *b;
00040   }
00041   Mypair()
00042   {
00043     //cout << "Mypair constructor2" << endl;
00044   };
00045   ~Mypair()
00046   {
00047   };
00048   
00049   bool operator<(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a) const
00050   {
00051     return val1<a.val1;
00052   }
00053   bool operator>(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a) const
00054   {
00055     return val1>a.val1;
00056    }
00057   bool operator>=(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a) const
00058   {
00059     return val1>=a.val1;
00060    }
00061   bool operator<=(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a) const
00062   {
00063     return val1<=a.val1;
00064    }
00065   bool operator==(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a) const
00066   {
00067     return val1==a.val1;
00068   }
00069   Mypair& operator=(const Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a)
00070   {
00071     //cout << (first()) << "=" << (a.first()) << endl;
00072     //cout << (second()) << "=" << (a.second()) << endl;
00073     *iter1 = a.val1;
00074     *iter2 = a.val2;
00075     return *this;
00076   }
00077 
00078   friend void swap(Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> a, Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> b)
00079   {
00080     a = b;
00081     b = a;
00082   }
00083   Iter1 iter1;
00084   Iter2 iter2;
00085   value_type1 val1;
00086   value_type2 val2;
00087 };

00097 template<typename Iter1, typename Iter2>
00098 class pair_iter
00099 {
00100 public:
00101   typedef Mypair<Iter1, Iter2> value_type;
00102   typedef typename std::iterator_traits<Iter1>::difference_type difference_type;
00103   typedef value_type* pointer;

00105   typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;

00108   {

00110   };
